text: Ana Lúcia Navarro Braga (December 13, 1934 – May 8, 2020), better known as simply Lúcia Braga, was a Brazilian politician, social worker and lawyer. She was born in João Pessoa, Paraíba. Braga was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1987 to 1995 and again from 2003 to 2007. Braga died at a hospital in João Pessoa on May 8, 2020 of COVID-19 while being hospitalized for a urinary tract infection, aged 85.Lúcia Braga, ex-deputada da PB, tem teste positivo para Covid-19; resultado foi liberado após morte Her husband, Wilson Braga, also died from COVID-19 a week after her death. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Deaths from urinary tract infection Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Paraíba
title: Lúcia Braga
